meaning_str.bing:
n. 天使；安琪儿（指善良的人或可爱的小孩）；善人
v. 出钱资助(演出等)
网络. 安吉尔；小天使；天使心

天使；安琪儿（指善良的人或可爱的小孩）；善人

天使；神使；安琪儿；（尤指仁慈的）精灵；保护神；<俚>好人；善人；天使般的存在

1.en: But the sea witch had lied. She didn't turn into foam. Instead, she became an angel. She was finally able to be happy and free.
1.cn: 没想到，海巫婆当时说的并非实话，小美人鱼并没有变成泡沫，她反而变成了一个天使。最后，她变得快乐又逍遥！

2.en: Looking up at the sky and noticing a cloud in the shape of an angel is another way we let you know that we are with you.
2.cn: 看著天空里的一朵形似天使的云，这是天使让你知道他们与你在一起的一种方式。

3.en: Indeed, despite his own heterodoxy, Angel often felt that be was nearer to his father on the human side than was either of his brethren.
3.cn: 说实在的，尽管安琪尔信仰异端邪说，但是他常常觉得在做人方面，他比两个哥哥更接近父亲。

1.en: That was the beginning of the Angel Network.
1.cn: 天使网络便从那时开始运作了。

2.en: Otherwise known as… Yeah, yeah. The Angel of Verdun.
2.cn: 大家都叫她... 对凡尔登的天使。

3.en: Angel, Azazel, Emma, Banshee. Mutant brothers and sisters, all dead!
3.cn: 天使，黄眼恶魔，艾玛，女妖，我们的变种人兄弟姐妹都死了。

4.en: So, the Angel Network, I've been on the air for a long time.
4.cn: 天使网络的想法在我心中萦绕已久。

5.en: But it was the Angel Network that actually focused my internal GPS.
5.cn: 正是天使网络让我确定了心中的那个导航仪。

6.en: Your turn. My stage name is Angel. It kind of fits. You can fly?
6.cn: 该你了。我的艺名叫“天使”， 挺合适。你会飞？

7.en: So you all have the power in your own way to develop your own Angel Network.
7.cn: 因此，你们每个人都有能力打造自己的天使网络项目。

8.en: Well, I don't know about that, but there were some people that said I looked like a floating angel.
8.cn: 我不知道，但有些宾客说，我看起来像飞天天使。

9.en: I'll be the only angel you need. You will leave life even more beautiful than you entered it.
9.cn: 我会是你唯一的天使。你生命的结局会比开端更加美丽。

10.en: So, this Angel Network, it didn't just change the lives of those who were helped, but the lives of those who also did the helping.
10.cn: 因此，对于天使网络而言，它并不只会改变那些得到帮助的人，也会改变那些施予帮助的人。

11.en: Ladies and gentlemen, in honor of Space Day at Angel Stadium, the first pitch will be thrown out by NASA astronaut Howard Wolowitz.
11.cn: 女士们，先生们，天使体育场为致敬太空日，特邀请航天总局宇航员霍华德沃罗威茨投开场第一球。

12.en: We got two ships and a large assortment of morons. So me and Groot will go with the pirate angel here. And the morons will go to Knowhere to try to stop Thanos.
12.cn: 我们有两艘船和一群各种各样的白痴。我和格鲁特跟这位海盗天使走。白痴们去虚无知地试图阻止灭霸。

13.en: I never wanted this world to have you. Be their hero, Clark. Be their monument. Be their angel. Be anything they need you to be. Or be none of it.
13.cn: 我从不希望这个世界拥有你，做他们的英雄吧，克拉克。做他们的丰碑，做他们的天使，成为任何他们想让你成为的形象，或者什么也不做。

14.en: I'm just so happy I have new clothes. Okay, final shirt. Then I get you two out of my angel hair.
14.cn: 我只是开心我终于有新衣服穿了，最后一件T恤了，然后你们俩就可以不用来烦我这个小天使了。

15.en: Han, you know, if it weren't for you, we would have never gotten this done. You really are a little angel.
15.cn: 阿憨，如果没有你，我们俩绝对不可能完成，你真是一个小天使啊。

16.en: He didn't have the beautiful voice of an angel but he did have the whistle of one.
16.cn: 他没有天籁般的声线但他的口哨却是天籁。
